title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized-crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: The Godfather: Part II
synopsis: The early life of Vito Corleone intercuts with his son Michael expanding the family empire.

title: Schindler's List
synopsis: Oskar Schindler saves the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
synopsis: The final confrontation for Middle-earth as Frodo nears Mount Doom.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: Interlocking stories of crime and redemption unfold in Los Angeles.

title: Inception
synopsis: A thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets and plant ideas.

title: Fight Club
synopsis: An office worker and a soap salesman start an underground fight club that evolves into something more.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: A humble hobbit sets out on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: Forrest Gump influences historical events while pursuing his childhood love.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
synopsis: The Fellowship is broken but continues the war against Sauron.

title: Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back
synopsis: The Rebels suffer setbacks while Luke trains with Jedi Master Yoda.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A hacker learns the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

title: Goodfellas
synopsis: The rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill and his friends.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
synopsis: A criminal pleads insanity and rebels against a mental institution.

title: City of God
synopsis: Two boys grow up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro and take different paths.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated killer to catch another.

title: Se7en
synopsis: Two detectives track a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as motives.

title: Requiem for a Dream
synopsis: Four people pursue their visions of happiness through drugs—spiraling into addiction.

title: Saving Private Ryan
synopsis: U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed.

title: Life Is Beautiful
synopsis: A father uses humor to shield his son from the horrors of WWII.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
synopsis: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must protect her son.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
synopsis: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races to find the Ark of the Covenant.

title: Léon: The Professional
synopsis: A professional assassin shelters a young girl whose family was murdered.

title: The Green Mile
synopsis: Guards on Death Row experience supernatural events after a gentle giant arrives.

title: Spirited Away
synopsis: A young girl enters a world of spirits to save her parents.

title: 3 Idiots
synopsis: Two friends search for their missing college buddy who inspired them to think differently.

title: The Usual Suspects
synopsis: A sole survivor recounts the twists leading up to a deadly boat explosion.

title: American History X
synopsis: A reformed neo-Nazi tries to prevent his younger brother from taking the same path.

title: Groundhog Day
synopsis: A cynical weatherman relives the same day over and over again.

title: Gladiator
synopsis: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance against a corrupt emperor.

title: The Departed
synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

title: The Prestige
synopsis: Two rival magicians obsessively compete for the ultimate illusion.

title: The Pianist
synopsis: A Polish Jewish pianist struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
synopsis: A botched card game triggers a series of misadventures involving gangsters.

title: Dogville
synopsis: A woman on the run finds refuge in a small town, which exacts a heavy price.

title: Inside Out
synopsis: Personified emotions guide a young girl through a life-changing move.

title: Drive
synopsis: A getaway driver finds himself in danger after helping his neighbor.

title: Trainspotting
synopsis: Heroin addicts in Edinburgh struggle to clean up and stay alive.

title: Rush Hour
synopsis: A Hong Kong detective teams with a loudmouthed L.A. cop to rescue a diplomat's daughter.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee a tyrant.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
synopsis: Batman faces a mysterious vigilante who murders mob bosses.

title: Philadelphia
synopsis: A lawyer with AIDS sues his firm for discrimination.

title: The Terminator
synopsis: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill Sarah Connor.

title: Heat
synopsis: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police.

title: Borat
synopsis: Kazakh journalist Borat travels to America to make a documentary.

title: Shrek
synopsis: An ogre rescues a princess to reclaim his swamp.

title: Justice League
synopsis: Batman and Wonder Woman recruit a team to defend the world from an alien threat.

title: The Shining
synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel where evil forces influence the father.

title: The Iron Giant
synopsis: A boy befriends a gentle giant robot from outer space.

title: Spectre
synopsis: James Bond uncovers a sinister organization while confronting ghosts from his past.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
synopsis: Harry learns a dangerous criminal has escaped Azkaban prison.

title: Spider-Man
synopsis: After being bitten by a spider, Peter Parker becomes Spider-Man.

title: Sex and the City
synopsis: A New York writer and her friends navigate loves and careers.

title: The Incredibles
synopsis: A family of undercover superheroes tries to live a quiet life.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
synopsis: An orphan learns he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School.

title: The Fountain
synopsis: A man travels through time to save the woman he loves.

title: Catch Me If You Can
synopsis: A young con artist forges millions before his 19th birthday.

title: Logan Lucky
synopsis: Two brothers attempt to pull off a heist during a NASCAR race.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
synopsis: A street kid is recruited into a secret spy organization.

title: Fury
synopsis: A tank crew fights behind enemy lines during WWII.

title: The Lives of Others
synopsis: In 1984 East Berlin, a Stasi agent becomes involved in the lives of the people he monitors.

title: Die Hard
synopsis: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and others taken hostage by terrorists.

title: Finding Nemo
synopsis: A timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring his son home.

title: Metropolis
synopsis: In a futuristic city, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet.

title: The Gold Rush
synopsis: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune.

title: Citizen Kane
synopsis: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final word.

title: Some Like It Hot
synopsis: After witnessing a mafia hit, two musicians disguise themselves as women and join an all-female band.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
synopsis: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

title: Oppenheimer
synopsis: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
synopsis: A Chinese-American laundromat owner is swept up in an insane adventure where she alone can save existence.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange when his identity is revealed, but a spell goes wrong.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People.

title: Dune: Part Two
synopsis: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.
